element.short: Nested codes in the expansion or not
element.definition: Controls whether or not the value set expansion nests codes or not (i.e. ValueSet.expansion.contains.contains).
element.comment: Nesting of codes is excluded if excludeNested is present and has a value of "true".
element.requirements: Heirahical contains are useful for UI use, but not when validating. Code Generation etc. may depend on context.
